bibl.title: Letter from Mary L. Penrose to Howard A. Kelly, July 5, [1907]

div1.p: Penrose sends a contribution for Kissinger.

div1.head: Letter from Mary L. Penrose to Howard A. Kelly, July 5, [1907]
div1.opener:
Ans
Germantown
July 5th
My dear Howard
div1.p:
It is with the
greatest pleasure that the
enclosed check is sent for the
“Hero” who has sacrificed his
life for the good of his Country.
I only wish that no one else
was involved in his sufferings.
He should never be allowed
to want.
div1.closer:
With much
love, Your affec- Cousin
Mary L. Penrose (Mrs Clement B. Penrose)
